summary: Diff implements the new Welcome screen and updates the ValentineFlow to start on it, while keeping falling hearts and background music visible across screens. It also sets the Valentine default GIF to the provided Hug Tenor URL (with existing fallback preserved) and adds the provided Kiss Tenor GIF to the Gift 2 screen with a graceful fallback UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduces a specific Tenor URL for the "Rose GIF" even though the BuildRequest explicitly notes that the Rose GIF URL is not provided and is a non-goal to generate/provide.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7 requires an image area for a Rose GIF but does not provide a URL; the request also states not to provide/generate the missing Rose GIF URL. The diff hardcodes a Rose Tenor URL anyway.
